text:
Since using the class name of an object is a common method for gettig a 
Category instance, it would be nice to add an additional getInstance method 
with the following signature:

   public static Category getInstance( Object obj )



The new method signature would allow me to use:
   Category cat = Category.getInstance(this);

Rather than the longer:
   getInstance( this.getClass() )
creator: ralph@fiol.net
bugzilla@apache.org
text:
Ralf,

People already have difficulty distingushing between getInstance(String) and 
getInstance(Class). I won't add to the confusion. My apologies.

This is my personal opinion, if you think this is unjust, then please write to 
log4j-user@jakarta.apache.org to push your case. If other people need this 
feature we will add it. Regards, Ceki
